page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Workshops
page.description: Enhance your Serverless Knowledge by attending a workshop from one of our partners.

workshops.title: Building and Scaling Agentic AI Workflows
workshops.description: Welcome to the Building and Scaling Agentic AI Workflows workshop! This workshop provides a hands-on experience for implementing agentic AI patterns using Amazon Bedrock, AWS Step Functions, and AWS Lambda. Learn about the different ways to implement Agentic AI. Compare and contrast the approaches and choose the one for your use case.

speakers.name: Michael Hume
speakers.title: AWS Senior Solutions Architect & UKPS Serverless Lead
